message.body: Hey Janine, I hadn't heard back from you, so I was wondering what was up for tomorrow? You got my email, right?
Hi, Let me know who you are. I cant tell from just the phone number. Maple sugaring event is still on.
Oh hey. We will all meet at my house at 730. I thought I emailed back....
Nope, Ella won't be there, you got that email right?
I sent it Monday or Tuesday. Ella's grandmother came down from Maine and is taking her to a play near Harrisburg. But in the email I said I can still drive if you need me to
Oh thanks.. Our car is now working againso I can drive. Thank you though. That was thoughtful of you!
Oh no problem, I didn't want to leave you guys stuck. She had told me about this at Xmas, but I had my dates/weeks mixed up. Have fun!
Hey just wanted to let you know we got home ok! We had fun today, thanks!
Meg, I assumed you would drive. Is that okay?
I'm sorry, I completely forgt. My mom had a stroke and we came to Lancaster..I'm sorry, we aren't going to be able to make it
So sorry to hear! I understand completely. Best to you and your mom.
Thanks, I'm sorry, I meant to text
